Package peril.views.slick.states

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Credits
    The InteractiveState of the Game where the credits are displayed.
    EndState
    The final InteractiveState where the winner and losers are displayed.
    Instructions
    The InteractiveState of the game where the instructions of the entire game are displayed.
    InteractiveState
    A BasicGameState that allows the user to click on Button and displays Viewable objects.
    LoadingScreen
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a loading screen.
    MainMenu
    Encapsulates the behaviour of the main menu.
    Opening
    The opening splash screen of the game.
    PlayerSelection
    The InteractiveState that allows the user to select the number of SlickPlayers and the AI that control those SlickPlayers.
